alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Oakland; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wayne, southern Oakland, southern Livingston and Washtenaw Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Clarkston to near Brighton to Gregory. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Whitmore Lake around 820 PM EDT. Milford and Chelsea around 825 PM EDT. South Lyon and West Bloomfield around 830 PM EDT. Pontiac around 835 PM EDT. Dexter and Salem around 840 PM EDT. Novi and Birmingham around 845 PM EDT. Troy, Southfield and Northville around 850 PM EDT. Ann Arbor and Royal Oak around 855 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Hudson Mills Metropark, Commerce, Delhi Mills, Lathrup Village, Pinckney State Recreation Area and Bingham Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
